script: Hi, I’m [Your Name]. Thank you so much for having us. I’m here helping [New Partner] get started in their business. They're in their training phase and need to complete six supported appointments. Tonight, I’ll present while they take notes and observe how we do things. There are two goals today: training and potentially earning some referrals. Sound good?

Thanks so much for giving us your time today – it’s helped [Partner] with their training. We’re always looking for referrals. Based on what we’ve shown you, do you know anyone who might benefit? Also, you could get a discount or even earn from those referrals!
While this was a training session, we’ve just shown you how much you could save. Would switching to UW be something that interests you? We'd love to help you benefit today.
